entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
